recursiveae2patternprovider.configuratio: Enable recursive AE2 pattern generation. When enabled, the mod will automatically generate dependency patterns for missing crafting ingredients

Default setting for allowing item substitutes in auto-generated patterns when parent pattern has no substitute info. When true, allows equivalent items (e.g., different wood types) to be used in recipes
Default setting for allowing fluid substitutes in auto-generated patterns when parent pattern has no substitute info. When true, allows equivalent fluids to be used in recipes
Maximum recursion depth for dependency pattern generation. -1 = no limit, 0 = disable recursion, positive values = max depth
Item required to craft recursive patterns. Use format 'namespace:item_name' (e.g. 'minecraft:iron_ingot', 'minecraft:diamond', 'ae2:calculation_processor')
